Zizipho Poswa (amụrụ n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1979) bụ ónyé na-ese ihe na ónyé na-emepụta ite na Cape Town, South Africa.

A mụrụ Poswa n'ubochí isé n'ọnwa Disemba, 1979 na Mthatha, ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ na Mahadum Teknụzụ nke Cape Peninsula Ọ gụrụ ihe eji eme akwa na kọleji. Ọ na-arụ ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ a na-akpọ Imiso Ceramics na ónyé na-ese ihe Andile Dyalvane. Ọ bụ ónyé na-ere ahịa Anthropologie na-eburu ite Imiso.

Ọrụ Poswa na-egosipụta ụmụ nwanyị Africa na ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị Xhosa na-arụ na ndụ nke ógè a. Ọ na-emepụta nnukwu ihe a tụrụ atụ nkè ákà. Usoro iLobola ya sitere n'ememe ndị Xhosa nke lobola, ma ọ bụ nwunye ọgaranya, omenala nke iji ehi kwụọ ezinụlọ nwanyị ahụ. Ọ na-esikwa n'ọrụ ụmụ nwanyị ime ọbọdọ na ụdị ntutu isi ọdịnala.
Powsa egosila ọrụ ya na Design Miami, Salon Art + Design, na Southern Guild gallery. E tinyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi Before Yesterday We Could Fly na Metropolitan Museum of Art.
Ọrụ ha dị na nchịkọta ndị a: Metropolitan Museum of Art, Los Angeles County Museum of Art.
